hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I'm from England preis cialis 20mg schweiz I have been on my own for nearly 15 years, after a 41-year marriage. I am 80, so I am a native now – I can speak for both old age and widowhood. I know what goes on here. Old age ambushes you; it creeps up, you knew vaguely that it was around, and then suddenly it has you by the neck. Losing a partner is another matter, of course, but I don’t want to go into the whole black business of grief.
